=== Introduction ===
Provides a refactoring that removes all region directives in a file.

=== Usage ===
Place the caret on a region directive and invoke the "Remove File Regions" refactoring.

=== History ===

 * Build 1154
   * Renamed Menu item from "Remove Regions" to "Remove File Regions"
 * Build 1153
